card.title: Krusty Burger T-Shirt
card.description: Hey, hey kids! It's your old pal, Krusty here on this vibrant Simpsons t-shirt featuring an ad for Krusty Burgers. Over Dozens Sold! The grinning face of the gravel-voiced clown on this Krusty phone stand will make you smile. Available in youth and adult sizes. Get it in a t-shirt, premium t-shirt, tank top, long sleeve tee, and sweatshirt, all right here on Amazon.
